title: Arthur Blank is “Good Company”
itunes:title: Arthur Blank is “Good Company”
description:
He’s the co-founder of the Home Depot who’s now better known as one of the most influential team owners in the U.S. Arthur Blank joins Jason Kelly to talk about his new book, and the lessons along the course of decades in business. Blank talks about the advice he got from Robert Kraft, Michael Vick’s remorse and the role his adopted hometown plays in a time of massive tumult and discussion around racial injustice.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
